mainText:
Dear Steve,
Thank you for all the creativity, inspiration and innovation that is Apple.
You created so much more than just great products and services but more
importantly you gave us life enriching and enhancing gifts. Forever will
your passions be engrained in all our lives for years to come -- and beyond.

Rest assured--what you created with Apple will live on and continue to
inspire, grow and enrich the world keeping your legacy alive. You will
always be remembered.
author: Eric
